lines.text:
[entering plush brokerage firm]
This is the office for me. The Taj Mahal with inkwells.

[entering T.T. Ralston's office]
Why, T.T. - this is too-too!
Yes, in a manly sorta way...
No, I don't lose. That's not a lie. That's an opinion. If I said YOU were good-looking - That'd be a lie.

[checking the clock]
In six more hours it'll be Christmas.
Christmas? Is Mr. Roosevelt moving those holidays around again?
